medical_history.chief_complaint: The patient was admitted due to polyuria, polydipsia, fatigue, and abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms of polyuria, polydipsia, fatigue, and abdominal pain presented over a period that is not specified.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diagnosed with diabetic ketoacidosis and type 1 diabetes mellitus (T1DM). Autoimmune thyroiditis was also diagnosed. A bifid big toe was surgically corrected at eight years and 11 months of age.
medical_history.family_history: The patient's mother had similar phenotypical features and the same EFNB1 mutation, compatible with craniofrontonasal syndrome (CFNS).  The mother was diagnosed with euthyroid autoimmune thyroiditis.
